definition: labor contract/contract between employer and employees governing wages and conditions
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: The employer may, on the basis of aforesaid regulation, terminate the labor contract.
sentences.chinese: 用人单位依据前述规定，均可以终止劳动合同。

sentences.english: This contract shall be terminated on the expiration date.
sentences.chinese: 劳动合同期满，即行终止。

sentences.english: Normal suggestion is to sign them now.
sentences.chinese: 通常的建议是补签劳动合同。

sentences.english: The job deerrorscription is part of every Tristate Enterprises employee's contract.
sentences.chinese: 职位描述是联亚公司劳动合同的一个组成部分。

sentences.english: The phenomenon of short-term labor contracts there are many problems.
sentences.chinese: 劳动合同短期化现象存在诸多问题。

sentences.english: The probation period shall be contained in the term of labor contracts.
sentences.chinese: 试用期包含在劳动合同期限内。

sentences.english: What is the nature of the liquidated damages?
sentences.chinese: 劳动合同违约金的性质如何？

sentences.english: If disputes happen in negotiation of a non-fixed term contract, what should the entity do?
sentences.chinese: 签订无固定期限劳动合同时，发生争议怎么办？

sentences.english: The alterations to the labor contract shall be made in written form.
sentences.chinese: 变更劳动合同，应当采用书面形式。

sentences.english: If an employer recruits workers whose original contract with another employer has not been terminated.
sentences.chinese: 用人单位招用尚未解除劳动合同的劳动者。

sentences.english: How to Dissolve Labor Contracts on Grounds of Serious Dereliction of Duty or Practice of Graft?
sentences.chinese: 如何以劳动者严重失职或营私舞弊为由解除劳动合同？

sentences.english: Labour contract with company stamp on it.
A certain because violates labor discipline, companies were lifted the labor contract.
sentences.chinese: 甲某因违反劳动纪律，被公司解除了劳动合同。

sentences.english: No fixed-term labor contract is an important kind of contract among labor contracts.
sentences.chinese: 无固定期限劳动合同是劳动合同中的一种重要类型。

sentences.english: No fixed-term labor contract is an important kind of contract among labor contracts.
sentences.chinese: 无固定期限劳动合同是劳动合同中的一种重要类型。

sentences.english: I've received the Notification of Termination of employment contract as upper content.
sentences.chinese: 本人已收执同上列内容的《解除劳动合同通知书》。

definition: to agree to and sign (a treaty etc)
piece rate wage/remuneration based on one's output/opposite: time rate wage 計時工資|计时工资[ji4 shi2 gong1 zi1]
